INSERT INTO task_detail(task_id, question_id, student_id) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{questionId},#{studentId});
mapper.select: SELECT task.id, newMajor.name AS majorName, task_date, add_state FROM task JOIN (SELECT id, name FROM major) AS newMajor ON newMajor.id = task.major_id;

SELECT task_detail.question_id, newTask.task_date, newStudent.major_id, newQuestion.chapter_id FROM task_detail JOIN (SELECT id, task_date FROM task) AS newTask ON newTask.id = task_detail.task_id JOIN (SELECT id, major_id FROM student) AS newStudent ON newStudent.id = task_detail.student_id JOIN (SELECT chapter_id, id FROM question) AS newQuestion ON newQuestion.id = task_detail.question_id WHERE task_detail.task_id = #{taskId} group by task_detail.question_id;
